arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss apologises to fans that travelled to Cambridge - We were miles off it
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney apologised to the Wigan Athletic fans for a first-half performance at Cambridge that was 'as bad as I've seen since I've been here', after seeing his side surrender their seven-match unbeaten run without so much as a whimper.

arts.ttl: Cambridge break duck in League One with win over Wigan
REPORT: Cambridge United 2 Wigan Athletic 0 - Lacklustre Latics taught a harsh lesson
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic put in arguably their worst performance under Shaun Maloney to give rock-bottom Cambridge United a first win since Easter Monday â€“ on their previous visit to the Abbey Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Nine changes in our expected team v Cambridge United
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Cambridge United

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic ace desperate to make up for lost time - 'What he wants from me is energy'
arts.sum: Tyrese Francois has signalled his intention to make up for lost time at Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Preview: Cambridge United vs. Wigan Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Cambridge United and Wigan Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic star back in the fold after taking time out for 'personal issues'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney says the return of Chris Sze to the Wigan Athletic training ground over the international break has given everyone a boost.

arts.ttl: Results not records the most important thing for Wigan Athletic boss - 'I've not heard it mentioned'
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic are on the verge of rewriting the history books as they prepare to travel to Cambridge United this weekend.
